name: My Guest Roma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You defently have no problem in Rome...cause Stefano gives you right informations for all Rome and how you can get in!!!!
reviews.title: We Loved it and we'll be back!!! Stefano is Perfect and very helpful!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was Lovely!!!!!
reviews.title: Best B&B we stayed at in Italy!

reviews.text: My Guest Roma was by far the best place that we stayed during our 2 week honeymoon in Italy. We spent our first 4 nights there and then a 5th night before our flight back to the States. Unfortunately, it was our first nights in Italy and Stefano spoiled us for the other B&B’s that we stayed at. His breakfast was the best, rooms were the cleanest, and not to mention Stefano was the friendliest. He made us feel like old time friends right away. All of his recommendations on where to go and where not to go were all spot on. He has maps available and will point out what bus to take, when to go, places to eat, etc. The pizza place about 3 blocks away was delicious. ATM located right around the corner and bus access a block away. On our next trip to Rome, we will definitely be staying with Stefano.
reviews.title: Fabulous stay. A great find and we thoroughly recommend it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a great little place to stay. Stefano the owner goes out of his way to make sure that you have an unforgettable visit. He is on a mission to give the best service possible and he doesn't disappoint. (We asked a random question about Roman Law before arrival as my daughter will study this and he sent a full break down of places to go, how to get there and opening times etc and more). He is very helpful, charming and considerate.
reviews.title: Clean Spacious Rooms, Quiet Neighborhood

reviews.text: The twin room we had was very comfortable with fresh flowers, a TV and a fridge and ample closet space. It has a modern feel with a very nice big bathroom. Breakfast is nice and fresh and the coffee is good too.
reviews.title: Excellent, I will be back with my wife one day

reviews.text: Stefano is so welcoming and such a concerned host--he stayed up late to greet me because I was delayed in my arrival, and still sat down with me to ask me what I wanted to do in Rome and to give me useful tips, including (a) how to look out for the right trains at Termini on my way to Verona and (b) how to dress appropriately for the churches etc. He even lent me his personal laptop so I could get online (although there is FREE WIFI).
reviews.title: Peaceful, welcoming, PERFECT

reviews.text: The room was spotlessly clean and Stefano upgraded me to a double at no charge. Lovely newly renovated attached bathroom with hot water & all the amenities, including in-room fridge and safe AND AIR-CONDITIONING at my disposal. Although the AC is included I hardly had to use it at night as the room was so cool, even in July.
reviews.title: wonderful warm and welcoming

reviews.text: It was so quiet and peaceful compared to my other stay in Verona and my room had a shady tree outside. The pictures/photos are ACCURATE =)
reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for our needs

reviews.text: Although My Guest Roma is not in "downtown" Rome, it's just a 7-10 minute walk to Bologna station (I'm a slow walker) or the bus stops are just outside the B&B. There is a convenient Carrefour supermarket just steps away from the B&B if needed, but Stefano's BREAKFAST was awesome--not just pastries but also cereal, toast, cheese, tomatoes, fruits, and of course coffee, tea, juice, etc.
reviews.title: It's more a friend's home than a hotel

reviews.text: If I ever come back to Rome, I WILL BE BACK!!! Grazie mille, Stefano! Aloha, Rebecca
reviews.title: We loved it and we'll return!

reviews.text: When you say "I have to come home" and not "I have to come to my B&B", this is the sign. My Guest is probably one of "five stars B&B" in the World, but only My Guest has got Stefano like boss!!! Every detail is taken care of and Stefano can give you every tip you need to have a enjoyable, relaxing and beautiful trip in Rome. Trust in me and have a good stay in MY GUEST ROMA.
reviews.title: My home

reviews.text: we stayed in june 2011.
reviews.title: very good value for the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: mr. stefano is very kind.gave useful advice and tips about rome.
reviews.title: Great trip to Rome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the room is modest and clean.
reviews.title: Fantastic B&B with a great host!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: safe neighborhood.everything that described in the website is true!
reviews.title: Excellent B&B in quiet(er) part of Rome!

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at My Guest Roma with my parents in April this year. Stefano was hugely helpful when booking our rooms suggesting the four of us stayed in the 2 BDRM apt and then as my parents were only staying for part of our trip my husband and i could move down into a double room. Stefano greeted us personally and spent a lot of time with a map making recommendations on what to see and do which was massively helpful. The rooms we stayed in were spotlessly clean and the breakfasts were delicous with fresh pastries. Stefano could not have been more lovely and welcoming - we had a fantastic stay and would definitely return!
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic B&B - highly recommended!

reviews.text: Stefano is a fantastic host. He made sure he could meet us as we arrived, offered us all the advice we needed and was at pains to ensure our comfort.
reviews.title: Great location, great accommodation and great service

reviews.text: The location is good with the bus route less than a block away, and the Metro ~7 minutes walk.
reviews.title: will definitely come back

reviews.text: His advice on where to eat suited us perfectly, with us returning to the same restaurant a second time to enjoy good food and vibe and good value.
reviews.title: Lovely!, perfect location for those who don't want to be stuck in the midst of the tourist throngs but still be close enough to

reviews.text: I am very happy to recommend My Guest Roma to any visitors to Rome.
reviews.title: Great place to stay and very helpful

description: My Guest Roma is located in a charming neighborhood in the heart of Rome. It is 5 metro stops from Colosseum and Roman Forum and is superbly well connected with Termini Central Station and all Rome touristic attractions. Suites combine modern design and 1930’s original fixtures. They all have private bathroom , in- room mini-fridge, complimentary wi-fi, individual air conditioning, TV, safety box and hairdryer. Microwave,tea/coffee facilities,fruits & snacks are at guests' disposal. A computer is available for those requiring it. The management offers: secure CAR PARKING; GLUTEN FREE breakfasts; KOSHER hospitality; tailor-made guided tours; pick ups.
